items.sentence: There are a lot of stores in this area, aren't there?
Aren't you glad that you didn't have to go to Boston?
I'm glad that someone told me what needed to be done.
That was such a good book that I read it three times.
Tom wants to be the first human to step foot on Mars.
Tom earned money by mowing lawns in the neighborhood.
I don't think it's a good idea to talk about it here.
Every time I think of Tom, I get a lump in my throat.
I forgot to shutter the windows before the storm hit.
I'll postpone my trip to Boston until it gets warmer.
Tom soon realized that he'd never be able to do that.
I don't want you to tell anyone what I just told you.
Restrictive practices can be damaging for industries.
Before I could say anything, Tom walked out the door.
Could you please ask Tom if he's planning to help us?
Do you really think Tom is the person we should hire?
I advised Tom not to borrow too much money from Mary.
I advised Tom not to leave his windows open at night.
I advised Tom to take the money he was being offered.
I don't think Tom can do what you've asked him to do.
